# CAM::SET_CAM_ACTIVE

## Summary
Sets a camera to be active and rendering, last cam set to active renders to the game

## Parameters
* **CAMERA_INDEX** camera
* **BOOL** activeState

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Set camera as active/inactive.
